tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor is very helpful in terms of identifying the exact diagnosis and then implementing on point treatment for all the dental issues, and even the staff is very kind.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ** * *** ** *** ****** *********  First of all, she has a keen eye for aesthetics and more importantly, a gentle and patient demeanor to help patients in every which way she can.  I needed a crown for a lower prominent tooth and she spent hours personally with me at the lab technician's office to give them feedback to get the tooth as close to a match as possible to my other teeth.  No other dentist has ever taken that kind of a personal role in my dental treatment before.  I strongly recommend her and I appreciate DentHeal for all of their hard work.  Dr. Viraj and Dr. Rati make a great combo when it comes to doing a smile makeover.  Thank you!
reply_text: Thankyou so much for all the appreciation & recommendation Sriram :) always striving to do the best for our patients!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The experience was very good with Dr. Rati, she explained the treatment options so well & helped me decide the best one  while being cost sensitive. She was also available on Sunday to answer my queries which I highly appreciate. Great expertise & very comforting environment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******** She explained my problem and offered a favourable solution to my long lasting issue. She was extremely patient with me and was super supportive and friendly. She also answered all of my thousand questions very calmly, something that is rarely seen today. I highly recommend Dr. Rati for your dental problems. Go for it, you're in good hands!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Prices are very steep & She is unprofessional * **** ***** ****** I was told a certain amount before treatment, ****** ********* ******* ********* * post treatment I got a bill which I was in shock for as she charged almost 2500 more than committed.After a long treatment of 3 cavities plus cleaning, I was so tired to even speak. This is not the way to take away someones hard earned money. ****** *** ************** *** ********** ******* ** ******  That's the reason everyone asks charges in advance because it's not mentioned anywhere in clinic which is all the more shadyy.She puts it on the customers by saying that it was a complicated cavity & unclean teeth which gives her the right to "Charge whatever she pleases" without informing customer, that's horrible.
reply_text:
We are taking this up with Practo support as this is not acceptable at all. Patients like you are never grateful for the services & care provided. You have been calling us for consult even after posting this, which we still catered to,  just  affirming the contradictory review you have given. Really disappointing to treat patients like you.
Please stop doing this as we are hearing of similar experiences from other doctors as well & we are considering further action against this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had a very pleasant experience with the doctor as well as the whole staff. Absolute top experience through and through

Impressed with the quality and efficiency of the staff. Also, the clinic is well equipped with the latest technology and gadgets. The doctor was fast and brusque with her work. A little gentler approach would be preferable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Rati is absolutely outstanding at her job. I visited to fix 2 of my laminates and she explained my options and was so patient with me throughout the procedure. I'm so happy with the results and can finally smile again!
reply_text: Really delighted to help you smile again :) always striving to do the best for my patients! Thankyou so much for the kind words & the appreciation.

She did her job very nicely good work....It scares me to visit a dentist but i feel good now she is good at her work.
reply_text: Glad to take your dental fears away & thankyou for the appreciation!
